Package org.moddingx.libx.util.math

Class IntPolynomial

java.lang.Object
org.moddingx.libx.util.math.Polynomial<Integer>
org.moddingx.libx.util.math.IntPolynomial
All Implemented Interfaces:
Function<Integer,Integer>, IntFunction<Integer>, IntUnaryOperator, UnaryOperator<Integer>
public final class IntPolynomial extends Polynomial<Integer> implements IntUnaryOperator, IntFunction<Integer>
A polynomial with integer coefficients.

  • Constructor Details

    • IntPolynomial

      public IntPolynomial(int... coefficients)
      Creates a new polynomial with the given coefficients. new IntPolynomial(2,0,1) gives for example the polynomial 2x²+1.

  • Method Details

      public List<Integer> coefficients()
      Description copied from class: Polynomial
      Gets the coefficients of this polynomial. For example, the coefficients [2, 0 1] represent the polynomial 2x²+1.
